currentIssues.description: Text contrast is too low - gray lyrics (#6b7280) on black background only achieves 4.74:1 ratio, barely meeting AA for normal text
Touch targets (settings and upload buttons) are too small for a teleprompter interface where users may be standing 3-10 feet away
Chord labels blend into background with orange on black, creating poor readability at distance
Font size is too small for teleprompter use - lyrics should be 48-72px for 3-10ft viewing distance
Line height is too tight for performance reading, should be 1.8-2.0x for teleprompter use

recommendations.title: Improve text contrast to WCAG AAA
recommendations.description: Change lyrics color from gray-500 to gray-200 or white for better contrast on black background

recommendations.title: Scale up all text for teleprompter viewing
recommendations.description: Increase base font size to 48-72px for lyrics, 36-48px for chord labels to ensure readability at 3-10ft distance

recommendations.title: Increase line height for performance reading
recommendations.description: Set line height to 2.0x for optimal readability during performance

recommendations.title: Enhance chord visibility with background highlights
recommendations.description: Add semi-transparent background boxes behind chord labels for better separation from black background
recommendations.code: className='bg-gray-800/50 px-3 py-1 rounded-md text-yellow-300 font-bold'

recommendations.title: Add performance control panel
recommendations.description: Create a separate large-button control panel optimized for touch/gesture control during performance
recommendations.code: buttonSize='min-h-24 min-w-24 text-2xl' // Large touch targets for performance use
